item.title: 22nd Dec 2024
item.description: General thoughts on today A Sociable Sunday It’s been a good, sociable day, starting with the Christmas service at The Bridge Saundersfoot. It still feels surreal that Christmas is only a few days away! Afterward, we headed to Tenby for some shopping, a walk, and a pint at Tenby House.
